cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Class CacheController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.CacheController

  • public class CacheController
extends Object
    Controller CacheController Class: This controller is used to modify the cache list of a user. The main objective of the class is adding, removing, saving and loading from the cache singleton class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SAVE_FILE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CacheController()
      CacheController constructor that assigns the cache class to be modified

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCache(Context cntxt, Comment comment)
      This method adds a saved comment to the cache list.
      boolean inCache(Comment comment)
      Method to check if comment is currently in the cache.
      void loadCache(Context cntxt)
      Method to load the saved comments (cache) from a file.
      void removeFromCache(Context cntxt)
      Method to remove a saved comment from the cache, remove comment when cache gets too full.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • SAVE_FILE

        public static final String SAVE_FILE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheController

        public CacheController()
        CacheController constructor that assigns the cache class to be modified

    • Method Detail

      • addToCache

        public void addToCache(Context cntxt,
              Comment comment)
        This method adds a saved comment to the cache list. The max size of the list is 20 comments before the removal of the last comment (first in first out style)
        Parameters:
        cntxt - The context of the application.
        comment - The comment that is saved

      • inCache

        public boolean inCache(Comment comment)
        Method to check if comment is currently in the cache.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to be checked
        Returns:
        The result of the check

      • loadCache

        public void loadCache(Context cntxt)
        Method to load the saved comments (cache) from a file.
        Parameters:
        cntxt - The application context

      • removeFromCache

        public void removeFromCache(Context cntxt)
        Method to remove a saved comment from the cache, remove comment when cache gets too full. Use first in first out style of removing.
        Parameters:
        cntxt - The context of the application
        comment - The comment to be removed
